name: Jeloly the invisible jelly
description:
Jeloly is a puzzle game made by 4 students in game design.

In this game, you have to guide Jeloly the little jelly throught a candy factory. But Jeloly is invisible. To help you see her, you have fewer jelly's foutains that make her appear when she's around one of them. You just need to click on the ground, and the fountain will be put.

You have a limited number of fountains per level. Use the arrows to move and the mouse to put fountains in the level.

Here are the members of the team :

Mélanie CAMPANELLA https://twitter.com/EtherealDreamST https://www.linkedin.com/in/m%C3%A9lanie-campanell...

Rémi URIDAT https://www.linkedin.com/in/r%C3%A9mi-uridat-40968...

Eric SCHEIBER https://www.linkedin.com/in/eric-scheiber-98a37968...

Claire VELLAS https://twitter.com/ClaireDeChat https://www.linkedin.com/in/claire-vellas-3b476110...

We hope you will enjoy our game and have fun !
